info.title: API - Inserção de dados de cosumo de API externo no Banco de dados
info.description: Essa API tem como Objeitvo gravar os dados de uma api externa para dentro do banco de dados e renderiazando no front-end

value.title: Princess Mononoke
value.description: Ashitaka, a prince of the disappearing Ainu tribe, is cursed by a demonized boar god and must journey to the west to find a cure. Along the way, he encounters San, a young human woman fighting to protect the forest, and Lady Eboshi, who is trying to destroy it. Ashitaka must find a way to bring balance to this conflict.
